solution_line_template: 1 bottle of soap will last for {washes_per_bottle} washes and he needs enough bottles for {total_washes} weeks so {total_washes}/{washes_per_bottle} = <<{total_washes}/{washes_per_bottle}={bottles_needed}>>{bottles_needed} bottles

Each bottle cost ${cost_per_bottle}.00 and he needs {bottles_needed} bottles so he will spend ${cost_per_bottle}*{bottles_needed} = $<<{cost_per_bottle}*{bottles_needed}={total_cost}>>{total_cost} on car soap
